dublin_core.dcvalue: In this short communication we redefine smartphone and enable it monitoring blood glucose as glucometer The proposed smartphone is not only a mobile phone but also a medical device glucometer An electrometer module acquiring the electrochemical current from the disposable enzymatic test strip on which a 0 5 L human peripheral whole blood drop is placed was integrated in the smartphone The medical smartphone is capable of directly measuring blood glucose concentration and uploading into personal health center by the 4G mobile communication internet This article is protected by copyright All rights reserved
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-08T14:19:00Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2-11-30
Blood glucose monitoring with smartphone as glucometer.
